verses.verse: וְהִנֵּ֣ה׀ <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh now behold אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish a man אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, of God בָּ֧א <WH935> ba And behold there came מִיהוּדָ֛ה <WH3063> mi-hu-Dah out of Judah בִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> bid-Var by the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵ֑ל <WH1008> 'El; unto Bethel וְיָרָבְעָ֛ם <WH3379> ve-ya-ra-ve-'Am and Jeroboam עֹמֵ֥ד <WH5975> 'o-Med stood עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- by הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach by the altar לְהַקְטִֽיר׃ <WH6999> le-hak-Tir. to burn incense

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra And he cried עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach against the altar בִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> bid-Var in the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said מִזְבֵּ֣חַ <WH4196> miz-Be-ach O altar מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> miz-Be-ach, altar כֹּ֖ה <WH3541> koh thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar thus saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> hin-neh- Behold בֵ֞ן <WH1121> ven Behold a child נוֹלָ֤ד <WH3205> no-Lad shall be born לְבֵית־ <WH1004> le-veit- unto the house דָּוִד֙ <WH1732> da-Vid of David יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <WH2977> yo-shi-Ya-hu Josiah שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo, by name וְזָבַ֣ח <WH2076> ve-za-Vach and upon thee shall he offer עָלֶ֗יךָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha, against אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כֹּהֲנֵ֤י <WH3548> ko-ha-Nei the priests הַבָּמוֹת֙ <WH1116> hab-ba-mOt of the high places הַמַּקְטִרִ֣ים <WH6999> ham-mak-ti-Rim that burn incense עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha, against וְעַצְמ֥וֹת <WH6106> ve-'atz-Mot bones אָדָ֖ם <WH120> 'a-Dam upon thee and men's יִשְׂרְפ֥וּ <WH8313> yis-re-Fu shall be burnt עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha. against

וְנָתַן֩ <WH5414> ve-na-Tan And he gave בַּיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom the same day הַה֤וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu the same מוֹפֵת֙ <WH4159> mo-Fet a sign לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying זֶ֣ה <WH2088> zeh This הַמּוֹפֵ֔ת <WH4159> ham-mo-Fet, This [is] the sign אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> dib-Ber hath spoken יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; which the LORD הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach Behold the altar נִקְרָ֔ע <WH7167> nik-Ra', shall be rent וְנִשְׁפַּ֖ךְ <WH8210> ve-nish-Pach that [are] upon it shall be poured out הַדֶּ֥שֶׁן <WH1880> had-De-shen and the ashes אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lav. and

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> vay-Hi become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <WH8085> chish-Mo-a' heard הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech And it came to pass when king אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> de-Var the saying אִישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- of the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which קָרָ֤א <WH7121> ka-Ra which had cried עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach against the altar בְּבֵֽית־ be-veit- אֵ֔ל <WH1008> 'El, in Bethel וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach that he put forth יָרָבְעָ֧ם <WH3379> ya-ra-ve-'Am Jeroboam אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יָד֛וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do his hand מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> me-'Al against הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach from the altar לֵאמֹ֣ר׀ <WH559> le-Mor saying תִּפְשֻׂ֑הוּ <WH8610> tif-Su-hu; Lay hold וַתִּיבַ֤שׁ <WH3001> vat-ti-Vash against him dried up יָדוֹ֙ <WH3027> ya-Do on him And his hand אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which שָׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sha-Lach which he put forth עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav, against וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo not יָכֹ֖ל <WH3201> ya-Chol so that he could לַהֲשִׁיבָ֥הּ <WH7725> la-ha-shi-Vah not pull it in again אֵלָֽיו׃ <WH413> 'e-Lav. about

וְהַמִּזְבֵּ֣חַ <WH4196> ve-ham-miz-Be-ach The altar נִקְרָ֔ע <WH7167> nik-Ra', also was rent וַיִּשָּׁפֵ֥ךְ <WH8210> vai-yish-sha-Fech poured out הַדֶּ֖שֶׁן <WH1880> had-De-shen and the ashes מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach; from the altar כַּמּוֹפֵ֗ת <WH4159> kam-mo-Fet, according to the sign אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֛ן <WH5414> na-Tan had given אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> 'ish which the man הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God בִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> bid-Var by the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> vai-Ya-'an answered הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech And the king וַיֹּ֣אמֶר׀ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish unto the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God חַל־ <WH2470> chal- Intreat נָ֞א <WH4994> na Please אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פְּנֵ֨י <WH6440> pe-Nei now the face יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God וְהִתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <WH6419> ve-hit-pal-Lel and pray בַּעֲדִ֔י <WH1157> ba-'a-Di, about וְתָשֹׁ֥ב <WH7725> ve-ta-Sho may be restored me again יָדִ֖י <WH3027> ya-Di for me that my hand אֵלָ֑י <WH413> 'e-Lai; about וַיְחַ֤ל <WH2470> vay-Chal entreated אִישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- And the man הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei accept יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD וַתָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> vat-Ta-shov was restored him again יַד־ <WH3027> yad- hand הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech and the king's אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to him וַתְּהִ֖י <WH1961> vat-te-Hi became כְּבָרִֽאשֹׁנָֽה׃ <WH7223> ke-va-Ri-sho-Nah. and became as [it was] before

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech And the king אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish unto the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God בֹּאָה־ <WH935> bo-'ah- Come אִתִּ֥י <WH854> 'it-Ti for הַבַּ֖יְתָה <WH1004> hab-Bay-tah home וּֽסְעָ֑דָה <WH5582> u-se-'A-dah; with me and refresh וְאֶתְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> ve-'et-te-Nah thyself and I will give לְךָ֖ le-Cha מַתָּֽת׃ <WH4991> mat-Tat. thee a reward

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אִישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- And the man הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech, unto the king אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> tit-ten- If thou wilt give לִי֙ li אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֲצִ֣י <WH2677> cha-Tzi me half בֵיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> vei-Te-cha, thine house לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo nor אָבֹ֖א <WH935> 'a-Vo I will not go in עִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> 'im-Mach; you וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor אֹ֤כַל <WH398> 'O-chal with thee neither will I eat לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> le-chem bread וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor אֶשְׁתֶּה־ <WH8354> 'esh-teh- nor drink מַּ֔יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim, water בַּמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> bam-ma-Kom in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. this

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For כֵ֣ן׀ <WH3651> chen so צִוָּ֣ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah For so was it charged אֹתִ֗י <WH853> 'o-Ti, בִּדְבַ֤ר <WH1697> bid-Var me by the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> Yah-weh God לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, saying לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- no תֹ֥אכַל <WH398> To-chal Eat לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem no bread וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor תִשְׁתֶּה־ <WH8354> tish-teh- nor drink מָּ֑יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim; water וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor תָשׁ֔וּב <WH7725> ta-Shuv, nor turn again בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> bad-De-rech by the same way אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הָלָֽכְתָּ׃ <WH1980> ha-La-che-ta. that thou camest

וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech went בְּדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> be-De-rech way אַחֵ֑ר <WH312> 'a-Cher; another וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- and did not שָׁ֣ב <WH7725> shav and returned בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <WH1870> bad-De-rech, not by the way אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בָּ֥א <WH935> ba that he came בָ֖הּ vah אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about בֵּֽית־ beit- אֵֽל׃ <WH1008> 'El. to Bethel פ Peh

וְנָבִ֤יא <WH5030> ve-na-Vi prophet אֶחָד֙ <WH259> 'e-Chad an זָקֵ֔ן <WH2205> za-Ken, old יֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> yo-Shev Now there dwelt בְּבֵֽית־ be-veit- אֵ֑ל <WH1008> 'El; in Bethel וַיָּב֣וֹא <WH935> vai-ya-Vo came בְנ֡וֹ <WH1121> ve-No and his sons וַיְסַפֶּר־ <WH5608> vay-sap-per- and told ל֣וֹ lo אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַמַּעֲשֶׂ֣ה <WH4639> ham-ma-'a-Seh him all the works אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which עָשָׂה֩ <WH6213> 'a-Sah had done אִישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- that the man הָאֱלֹהִ֨ים׀ <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God הַיּ֜וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom that day בְּבֵֽית־ be-veit- אֵ֗ל <WH1008> 'El, in Bethel אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדְּבָרִים֙ <WH1697> had-de-va-Rim the words אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> dib-Ber which he had spoken אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech, unto the king וַֽיְסַפְּר֖וּם <WH5608> vay-sap-pe-Rum them they told לַאֲבִיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> la-'a-vi-Hem. also to their father

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> 'a-le-Hem about אֲבִיהֶ֔ם <WH1> 'a-vi-Hem, And their father אֵֽי־ <WH335> 'ei- what זֶ֥ה <WH2088> zeh he הַדֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> had-De-rech unto them What way הָלָ֑ךְ <WH1980> ha-Lach; went וַיִּרְא֣וּ <WH7200> vai-yir-'U had seen בָנָ֗יו <WH1121> va-Nav, he;For his sons אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> had-De-rech way אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הָלַךְ֙ <WH1980> ha-laCh went אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who בָּ֖א <WH935> ba which came מִיהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> mi-hu-Dah. from Judah

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to his בָּנָ֔יו <WH1121> ba-Nav, unto his sons חִבְשׁוּ־ <WH2280> chiv-shu- Saddle לִ֖י li הַחֲמ֑וֹר <WH2543> ha-cha-Mor; me the ass וַיַּחְבְּשׁוּ־ <WH2280> vai-yach-be-shu- So they saddled ל֣וֹ lo הַחֲמ֔וֹר <WH2543> ha-cha-Mor, him the ass וַיִּרְכַּ֖ב <WH7392> vai-yir-Kav and he rode עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lav. and

וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <WH1980> vai-Ye-lech, went אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish the man הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God וַיִּ֨מְצָאֵ֔הוּ <WH4672> vai-Yim-tza-'E-hu, and found יֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> yo-Shev him sitting תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> Ta-chat under הָאֵלָ֑ה <WH424> ha-'e-Lah; under an oak וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and he said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, about הַאַתָּ֧ה <WH859> ha-'at-Tah are you אִישׁ־ <WH376> 'ish- unto him [Art] thou the man הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who בָּ֥אתָ <WH935> Ba-ta that camest מִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> mi-hu-Dah Judah וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> 'A-ni. he

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer Then he said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, to him לֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> lech Come אִתִּ֖י <WH854> 'it-Ti for הַבָּ֑יְתָה <WH1004> hab-Ba-ye-tah; home וֶאֱכֹ֖ל <WH398> ve-'e-Chol with me and eat לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> La-chem. bread

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, And he said לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo nor אוּכַ֛ל <WH3201> 'u-Chal I may לָשׁ֥וּב <WH7725> la-Shuv not return אִתָּ֖ךְ <WH854> 'it-Tach for וְלָב֣וֹא <WH935> ve-la-Vo with thee nor go in אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> 'it-Tach; for וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor אֹ֣כַל <WH398> 'O-chal with thee neither will I eat לֶ֗חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem, bread וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor אֶשְׁתֶּ֤ה <WH8354> 'esh-Teh nor drink אִתְּךָ֙ <WH854> 'it-te-Cha for מַ֔יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim, water בַּמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> bam-ma-Kom with thee in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. this
